Text: i am new to the whole digital camera thing ; well , new to the whole camera thing period , really .  this camera was affordable , very easy to learn , and produces spectacular images .  the auto-mode is good enough for most shots but the 4300 also boasts 12 versatile scene modes as well as a manual mode though i admit i have n't played with it too much on manual .  it 's size also makes it ideal for travel .  overall the nikon 4300 is a very dependable , robust , and useful little camera .
